name: .INV File Extension
summary: Learn about .INV files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by INVedit, a program used to create and modify inventories for the game Minecraft; contains game inventory item information, such as resources, weapons, mining tools, and other equipment; also stores quantities of each inventory item.

content: When done editing an inventory in INVedit, it can be built into a Minecraft world file, and then the world can be loaded into the Minecraft game. INV files can also be imported into "chests" using MCEdit, a Minecraft world editor.
NOTE: Minecraft is a sandbox construction game that allows players to build and destroy blocks and other objects in a 3D environment.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
